description:
In this course we will learn Introduction To Illustrator That can help you to use this software freely and introduces you to the latest and greatest techniques in this Software.

Karim Ali Adobe Certified Instructor, he has 10 years experience in teaching Graphics Programs like Photoshop , Illustrator , Indesign and Motion Graphics Programs like After Effects , Cinema 4D and he will explain this course .

Adobe Illustrator is amazing Software that can help you to Make Everything you want to Draw it like :

  • Drawing Vector Graphics .
  • Make a Logos .
  • All Print Documents like Business Card, Catalogs, Flayers ,....... .
  • Working with imaging that convert in to Cartoon .
  • Make Cartoon Characters .
  • Make Apps interface .
  • Design Web sites Interfaces .

We will Give to the Students all Materials That will be effective with their like : images and Ai Files.

in this course you will spend with us 7 hours .

Course contains a structured way in order to reach information to the trainee with easy .

This Course will teach you amazing intro to Illustrator .

We Hope to enjoy with this Course ...
title: Intro to Illustrator
